author: Hemani Bhandari
title: Stuck at Raja Garden night shelter, people long to get home
description: Shutdown of non-essential services forces people from other States to stay back
content:
At a night shelter in west Delhis Raja Garden, a 45-year-old woman from Assams Guwahati, who was not sure how long she would be stuck and when she would get to see her husband who works in Punjab, was in tears.
The nationwide shutdown of non-essential servic… [+3225 chars]
